name: Moonfall Covenant
shortDescription: The Moonfall Covenant are militant devotees of the broken moon's memory, wielding silver flame and sacred song to purge corruption. Clad in scorched relic-plate and marked by holy burns, they deliver both salvation and annihilation in equal measure. Their war is not for territory â€” it is for cleansing.
description: The Moonfall Covenant draws its power from the shattered remains of a fallen moon. Their warriors are marked by lunar scars that pulse with cold light, and they wield weapons forged from moon-metal that can cut through reality itself.
